name: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Fry bacon. 3. Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese. 4. Combine pasta, bacon, and egg mixture. 5. Sprinkle black pepper on top. Enjoy!

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add onions and stir-fry. 3. Add carrots and bell peppers. 4. Add broccoli and soy sauce. 5. Cook until vegetables are tender. Serve hot!
